ComicInfo.Title: Magic Socks Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gwen and Rita are forced to pick up the pieces after Daphne's brutal death. Josie moves into power with the Magic Socks, quickly becoming a pop cult sensation. This third issue is stuffed to the gills with an action-packed story, bonus art, soundtrack, and sketchbookâ€”plus, a variant cover by the mighty, mighty MIKE HUDDLESTON! Pure fun! Pure flavor!
